description:
Title:
In The Fog Aka V Tumane

Country:
Russia/Ukraine, 2012

Language:
Russian

Subtitle:
English

Director:
Sergei Loznitsa

Writers:
Vasili Bykov (novel), Sergei Loznitsa (adaptation)

Stars:
Vladimir Svirskiy, Vladislav Abashin, Sergei Kolesov

Synopsis:
Western frontiers of the USSR, 1942. The region is under German occupation. A man is wrongly accused of collaboration. Desperate to save his dignity, he faces impossible moral choice. 

Trivia:
Official Selection Cannes Film Festival 2012
